section.para: Accounts are central to CRM. An Account holds information about an entity and serves to define it further as a Customer, Prospect, Vendor, Competitor, or Partner. To access the master list of CRM Accounts, select the "List CRM Accounts" option. The following screen will appear.

note.para: The system-defined default filter on the CRM Accounts list screen shows all active CRM Accounts.
